name: Amaterasu-san wa Hikikomoritai!
nutshell: Amaterasu Omikami is the charismatic supreme ruler of the Japanese heavens, Takamagahara. The young god Yamato arrives to serve this most admired deity to find… That she's a hardcore geek and introvert? A divine comedy about one down-to-earth god!

name: March Bud
nutshell:
Contains three stories.

Chimi is impatiently awaiting spring and her 14th birthday. Not yet ready to give up her tomboy ways, Chimi has a lot of confusion to deal with when she feels the first stirrings of girlhood awakening inside her.

name: Sabrina
nutshell: A quick one-shot about a man coming across a girl with fairy-like wings whose right arm is trapped through a hole.

name: Cathexis
nutshell: A brief story about finding a purpose in life, and working singlemindedly to achieve it…

name: Gaman Nante Oyoshinasai
nutshell: After meeting on the train home, a student agrees to cook weekly for a lonely salaryman, starving for both homecooked meals and affection.

name: Kattobi Itto
nutshell:
Katori Itto and Yura Kazuma are childhood rivals. Itto is small and quarrelsome while Kazuma is big and vindictive. Itto has been holding a grudge against Kazuma for a long time from the scar Kazuma made him five years ago during a fight… After years of travelling with his father, Itto finally returns to Japan only to reunite with a childhood rival, Kazuma. A very hilarious combination of circumstances will bring the unpredictable Itto to join Kazuma's soccer team at Seiga Middle School… The manga follows this wacky duo as they, alongside the rest of the team, 'battle' other middle school teams on the road to becoming Japan 's best. The intense footy goodness is only second to the ridiculously hilarious situations that Itto somehow manages to find himself in.
Note: Chapter numbering comes from different sources - Volume 4, Chapter 16 continues off of Chapter 17 and is different from the first Chapter 16.

name: Mahou Shoujo Madoka★Magica - KISS ME BABY! (Doujinshi)
nutshell: A Kyouko x Sayaka doujin series.

name: Souryuu no Sobayounin: Shirogane no Ryuuhen
nutshell:
The era goes back, and there is no curse of the dragon yet.
Tina, the captive princess, meets the dragon Yugwon, who is also a captive.
Tina, who is killed by her father and is taken over by her own country, but does not give up the revival of her country, and Yugwon, who is separated from his flock but struggles to finish his life in a place like this. Is this encounter a coincidence or a necessity?
A fantasy romance that transcends species begins again!

name: Hitomi - Sakayume no Niwa (Doujinshi)
nutshell:
Ran has a dream in which Byakuroku vanishes into thin air and only bones remain. Even knowing it was a dream, he can't just help being worried. Will the dream become reality…?
Available for read under Mawaru Sekai no Kimi to Boku as ch 5.

name: Chanto, Kimochi, Ikankei. ~ Incubus Joushi x Fukanshou OL
nutshell: "If I sleep with an incubus, will my psychosexual disorder be cured?" From this union of fated interests, the world's purest romance will now begin...!?

name: Anata no Chocolate Chotto Kudasi
nutshell:
Pairing: Shiro x Mephisto
Full color.

name: Elf 17
nutshell: Ruu, an elf who haphazardly won the Grand Galactic Martial Arts Tournament, and K.K., the runner-up mechanic, go on a journey across the galaxy accompanying Muscat Tylor, the eccentric prince of the Galactic Empire.

name: Yuukaikon
nutshell: Saika and her father are trying to hold on to their small coffee shop against redevelopment. When her father was hospitalized for the stress, Saika was kidnapped by the heir of the development company and locked up in his apartment. He doesn't just want Saika's land, he wants her to marry him, too!

name: Marchioness Emilia's Butler Jack Is Deep in Debt
nutshell: The sweet story of a tsundere and a butler in debt living together.

name: The Demonic Contract
nutshell: Yurisina, the daughter of the demon king, has always wanted to become a full-fledged demon by making her first contract with a human. That's when Princess Marianne of the Pedin Kingdom summoned her to take revenge on Queen Orphelius who poisoned her, and asks Yurisina to live in her place...

name: Only Mine
nutshell:
A collection of stories:

Only Mine
Omoi Megurasu (Think About)
Dare yori Negau Shiawase wa (I Wish Your Happiness More Than Anyone)
Boku no Jiman no Koibito desu (You Are My Special Lover)
Mokuyoubi no Yoru, Sentou de (At Thursday Night, In Public Bath)
Only Mine: Extra

name: Forbidden Love with a Prince
nutshell:
“Have we met before?”
A mysterious handsome young man named Ernest approaches Sherry, an aspiring actress working at a café. Sherry is strangely attracted to him, but the two suddenly get involved in a bank robbery. The truth is, however, that Ernest is actually a prince hiding his identity...!?

name: Witch of the Old World
nutshell: A 64-page fantasy/sci-fi one-shot that ran in Afternoon. Winner of the Four Seasons Award but didn't get serialized.

name: Kuchizuke wa Niji no Ue de
nutshell: Momozu is a frumpy, indoorsy "hare-otoko", and sunny weather seems to follow him around, while Toyotama is a cheerful, athletic "ame-otoko", constantly dogged by stormy weather. When the two meet and Toyotama convinces Momozu to join a mountain-climbing club together, it's a total case of opposites attracting!

name: Incredible June
tags: Long Strip,Romance,Drama,Web Comic,Slice of Life,Full Color
nutshell: The popular and beautiful BL manhua artist’s new neighbor is a handsome male idol?! The idol starts attacking her with hidden hints, but the beautiful manhua artist still can’t figure out that he was the guy that she was in love with during high school! …As these two people go about their jobs and remember their past, a hilarious, sweet, and pure story will unfold!

name: Ring My Bell!
nutshell:
Hell yeah! A major publisher wants Mai Sohn to write a webcomic on relationships. But she’s struck with heartbreak as her girlfriend abruptly dumps her. It’s hard writing about relationships without being in one, so she needs to find the inspiration for love — and find it fast. And what’s up with her possibly homophobic neighbor? Why is she cool with Mai one minute and then so awkward and weird to her the next?! Can’t a girl catch a break?


Official Thai Translation

name: Tiger & Bunny - Excessive Happiness (Doujinshi)
nutshell: Pairing: Barnaby x Kotetsu, Kotetsu x Barnaby

name: Tales of Zestiria - Once upon a time (Doujinshi)
nutshell: Sorey x Mikleo

name: Mark Of The Succubus
nutshell: For Aiden, high school life is a bore, and he spends his days daydreaming through class. His dull life takes a turn when he meets Maeve, a succubus-in-training posing as a transfer student. Maeve has marked Aiden as her victim, but as their relationship blooms, things begin to change

name: The Saint Alice Empire
nutshell:
(from ebookjapan):
On the day she transferred to St. Alice's Academy, Momoko Hanaki was told by a teacher, "Poor Momoko.... The school has a system of special honor students, and students who contribute to the school have priority in everything."
The students are all full of individuality, including the queen, Hazumiko Yamato, who is higher than the principal, the thief, Zero, who is a friend of the weak, and the vandal, Jiro Kido, who is a member of the school's ministry.

name: The Dragon-Devouring Ant
nutshell: The protagonist, Zheng Lang, reincarnated as an ant in an alternate world after his death and obtained an ancient summoner inheritance. This is a story of him meeting new friends and adventuring in the alternate world.

name: McBritain
tags: Action,Comedy,User Created,Drama,School Life,Web Comic,Slice of Life
nutshell:
Seiya Watanabe, a Japanese student heads to a British Boarding School for his studies with high hopes. However, the reality is very different from his expectations. A series of unfortunate events turn Seiya's life into a survival exercise and his goals upside down. McBritain is a story about the daily lives of students from different parts of the world studying in a British Boarding School.
Story and Art by Trigger -トリガー:
Main Website - http://triggermanga.com/
Creator's Twitter - https://twitter.com/Trigger70384161
Creator's Facebook Page - https://www.facebook.com/TriggerVerse
Please consider following McBritain and our social media pages if you enjoy our work  :)

name: The Man Who Saw Hell
nutshell: ‘Salaryman from Hell’ is the first in a collection of Ebisu’s stories entitled “The Man Who Saw Hell.” It’s about the day in the life of a normal Japanese salaryman. For the uninitiated, salarymen are an iconic figure in modern Japan, taking the role of everyman. Ebisu uses this generic salaryman figure in most of his stories.
